name: Hotel Sol

reviews.text: We spent two nights here in May 2007 in the Hotel Sol. (Apparently they have a hostal as well for a slightly cheaper cost.)
reviews.title: Good budget option in Toledo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is a bit hard to find by car. It is at the far end of a street which is connected by a few steps to the main road out to the Bisgra gate. However to get to it requires going around the outside walls from a different direction. We reserved parking in their underground lot.
reviews.title: Pleasant surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our rooms were fine, especially at the price. They had a balcony overlooking the road, and the rest of Toledo beyond. Bathrooms were clean and functional. The breakfast, which we took one morning, was nothing special.
reviews.title: Excellent and Very Affordable
Great inexpensive hotel
reviews.text: Since everything in Toledo is within walking distance, this hotel is a fine choice for travellers. We liked it better than we thought we would.

reviews.title: Great little hotel by the city walls
reviews.text: Decided to stop in Toledo on our way to Granada from Donostia, had previously stayed at Hotel Santa Isabella but they were full, this was our 4th stop, they had plenty of room and were in a good location, turned out to be a pleasant surprise. Staff very helpful, above average room for Spain, reasonable price with breakfast, and as other reviewer stated, the staff spoke english. Parked the car for free right in front of hotel and a five minute walk uphill to Zocodover.

The Hotel is located very near to the city center, in a quite road. We were three and stayed just for a night in a double room with an additional bed. The reception speak a good English and were very kind.
reviews.title: Good Budget and Good Location
The Sol suited seniors
reviews.text: The room was very clean and recently renovated, not very large but really cleaned. The A/C was working good. The price was very competitive (70€ for the room). When stayed in august 2006 the breakfast wasn't available since the breakfast room was under renovation.
In my opinion the quality was above the 2 stars.
reviews.title: Fine choice
Spacious, clean and modern.
reviews.text: Couple of Seniors stayed 3 nights at the Hotel Sol in Toledo in March 06.We booked on-line with spain-bookings.com and saved E60 on normal room price.Comfortable beds, new bathroom, sunny petite balcony.Very nice English speaking receptionists.Hotel is inside city walls right next to the Sun Gate and 20 mins walk from the Bus Station.Five minute walk up hill to main square.

reviews.title: good location, has parking
reviews.text: This hotel is a fine choice. The rooms are a bit small but clean and tastefully appointed. The entire place seems to have been remodeled quite recently. The air conditioning works well enough (though it's not great if you're like me and prefer your room to be < 70).

description: The Hotel Sol is ideally located next to the Puerta del Sol in the historical centre of Toledo. It offers practical and well-priced accommodation.The rooms of the Hotel Sol are modern and charming. All of them have air conditioning and heating. All rooms have a bathroom with bath and shower. Some have balconies. Wi-Fi is available on request.Non smoking policy. Private parking available.The hotel is situated in Toledo’s beautiful old town. Most of the city’s main landmarks are within easy walking distance, including the Mosque, Cathedral, Alcázar, the Jewish quarter and Plaza ZocodoveThe bus station is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. From there you can get coaches to Madrid, taking about 1 hour. The train station is about 1 km away.
